abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 228	    INTRODUCED BY ALDERWOMAN DIONNE FLOWERS    AN ORDINANCE TO ESTABLISH A BOARD TO REVIEW AND RECOMMEND PUBLIC WORK PROJECTS TO BE APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF PUBLIC SERVICE PURSUANT TO SECTION 3.16 OF THAT CERTAIN DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT DATED OCTOBER 19, 2010 BETWEEN THE PORT AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF ST. LOUIS AND CASINO CELEBRATION, LLC WHICH DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT APPROVED A NEW CITY GAMING DEVELOPMENT PLAN; AUTHORIZING CERTAIN ACTIONS BY CITY OFFICIALS; AND CONTAINING A SEVERABILITY CLAUSE.
